channel.title: Problem with client
channel.description:
Hi, i'm trying to play my server so i run client...after like 30 seconds it suddenly shuts down it says this long message in run.bat but it goes away so fast that i can't take a scrreenie....i have java and jdk 6_14 on other computers i don't have this problem
here
[img]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/4798/73331664.jpg[/img]

item.title: Problem with client
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

@echo off
cd PkHonor Client V1
title Client
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
pause

and i had java

oh btw im using 64 bits…

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with client
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“2killsami, post:1, topic:290631”]Hi, i’m trying to play my server so i run client…after like 30 seconds it suddenly shuts down it says this long message in run.bat but it goes away so fast that i can’t take a scrreenie…i have java and jdk 6_14
on other computers i don’t have this problem[/quote]
Right click your run.bat for the client and add pause to the bottom.
And then post the code[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 01:38:46 am[/size][hr][quote=“2killsami, post:1, topic:290631”]Hi, i’m trying to play my server so i run client…after like 30 seconds it suddenly shuts down it says this long message in run.bat but it goes away so fast that i can’t take a scrreenie…i have java and jdk 6_14
on other computers i don’t have this problem[/quote]
And 2nd of all jdk compiles stuff You need to download java not jdk.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 01:40:51 am[/size][hr]And again post in client help next time.

Read full topic
